structure.unit: RIOT, DISORDERLY CONDUCT, AND RELATED OFFENSES

law.catch_line: Assault on a service animal in the second degree.

text.section: A person is guilty of assault on a service animal in the second degree when he intentionally and without legal justification or lawful authority causes physical injury to a service animal.
Assault on a service animal in the second degree is a Class B misdemeanor.

law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 419, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1998.
